title: The Customer Service Dimension
description: Unlike investment returns or interest rates, advisors can fully control the quality of service they provide to clients, says Cassaday & Co. CEO Stephan Cassaday.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Unlike investment returns or interest rates, advisors can fully control the quality of service they provide to clients, says Cassaday & Co. CEO Stephan Cassaday.
